rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that leads to the living areas, incorporating Vastu principles for a welcoming energy.
Open-plan living area with integrated dining space and lounge seating, ensuring ample natural light from the West-facing plot.
Minimalist open kitchen adjoining the living room, featuring modern appliances and efficient workspace.
Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom located on a quiet corner of the floor plan in adherence to Vastu principles.
Balanced bedroom for additional family members with easy access and privacy.
Additional compact bedroom for guests or children.

openings.description: Direct door opening for seamless transition between spaces.
Large sliding door for open-plan connectivity.
Floor-to-ceiling windows facing West for abundant natural light while maintaining privacy with minimalistic treatments.
Convenient access from the second bedroom to the main hall.

rooms.description: Fully equipped private gym designed to fit a corner area of the penthouse with ample ventilation and soundproofing.
Additional bathroom for convenience within the penthouse level.

openings.description: Skylight window to maximize natural light and ventilation.
Direct door providing seamless integration between the gym area and other penthouse spaces.
